item.title: BMW E39 Cup Holder Replacement DIY
item.description: Today I installed replacement cup holders into my E39 540i/6. The following is a quick tutorial on how to do the same to your E39! Objective: Replace broken cup holders which no longer stay closed. Applicable Vehicles: 1996-2003 BMW E39 5-series: 520i, 523i, 525i, 528i, 530i, 535i, 540i, M5. Parts required: 51168190205 Cost: $30-$100 Difficulty: Very Low Time Required: 5-10 minutes. Procedure: To see how to do this for yourself, watch the embedded video below!
